name: astrolost
description:
Stranded on a foreign planet. Surrounded by heinous monsters. Armed only with your wits you must escape this desolate planet. Collect parts for your broken moonlander. Find out about the world from notepads scattered all around the map. 

Just remember that moving costs you a lot of air so try to plan..your..moves?

The game was made for the Secret Santa GameJam. You move around with WASD and to Exit the game on windows you press Escape.

Software used: 
I used Unity as game-engine 
Asesprite for sprites and Krita for drawing bigger the 1 min menu
Used GifTuna for the gifs
BFXR for the sounds
ShadowPlay to record the game footage.
